## About Assignment 2

Goal of lab is to simply load a table from a SQL database into an R dataframe. We will also deal with missing values. 
```{r, load-package, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
install.packages('odbc')
library(odbc)
install.packages('RODBC')
library(RODBC)
install.packages('sqldf')
library(sqldf)
install.packages("mice")
library(mice)
```
```{r, load-data}
con <- odbcDriverConnect(connection = "Driver= {SQL Server Native Client 11.0};server=localhost;database=DBex;trusted_connection=yes")
queryresult <- sqlQuery(con, "select * from movies")

imputed.data <- mice(queryresult)
```
